mapper.insert: insert into GQPTZ_YCSJB (GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, YWDC, YWLX, YCQX, YCQJ, PSCD, ZTFHCD) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywdc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycqj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ztfhcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, YWDC, YWLX, YCQX, YCQJ, PSCD, ZTFHCD from GQPTZ_YCSJB
